languages.text: {n}Кас Беллардо, первым сообразивший, к чему идет дело, бухается на колени.{/n} "Пощадите! Я ни в чем не виноват! Я — не пират, не душегуб, просто безобидный пьяница! И отец-одиночка к тому же!"

{n}Kas Bellardo, the first to guess where this is going, falls to his knees.{/n} "Mercy! I haven't done anything wrong! I'm not a pirate, not a cutthroat, just a harmless drunk! And a single father to boot!"
languages.original_text: {n}Кас Беллардо, первым сообразивший, к чему идет дело, бухается на колени.{/n} "Пощадите! Я ни в чем не виноват! Я — не пират, не душегуб, просто безобидный пьяница! И отец-одиночка к тому же!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kas Bellardo, the first to have guessed where this is going, falls to his knees.{/n} "Mercy! I haven't done anything wrong! I'm not a pirate, not a cutthroat, just a harmless drunk! And a single father to boot!"

languages.text: {n}卡斯·贝拉多第一个猜到了接下来会发生什么事情，他立刻跪倒在地。{/n}“饶命啊！我没有做过任何坏事！我不是海盗，也不是杀手。我只是个人畜无害的酒鬼！而且我还是个单身父亲！”
languages.original_text: {n}Kas Bellardo, the first to guess where this is going, falls to his knees.{/n} "Mercy! I haven't done anything wrong! I'm not a pirate, not a cutthroat, just a harmless drunk! And a single father to boot!"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡斯·贝拉多第一个猜到了接下来会发生什么事情，他立刻跪倒在地。{/n}“饶命啊！我没有做过任何坏事！我不是海盗，也不是杀手。我只是个人畜无害的酒鬼！而且我还是个单身父亲！”

languages.text: {n}Kas Bellardo, el primero en entender por dónde va la cosa, cae de rodillas.{/n} «¡Piedad! ¡No he hecho nada malo! ¡No soy un pirata ni un asesino, soy un simple borracho! ¡Y padre soltero!».
languages.original_text: {n}Kas Bellardo, the first to guess where this is going, falls to his knees.{/n} "Mercy! I haven't done anything wrong! I'm not a pirate, not a cutthroat, just a harmless drunk! And a single father to boot!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kas Bellardo, el primero en entender por dónde va la cosa, cae de rodillas.{/n} «¡Piedad! ¡No he hecho nada malo! ¡No soy un pirata ni un asesino, soy un simple borracho! ¡Y padre soltero!».

languages.text: {n}流れに最初に気づき、キャス・ベラルドが膝をついた。{/n}「ゆ、許してくれ！俺は何もしてない！海賊でもないし、冷酷非道な奴でもない…ただの酔っ払いだ！それに加えて父子家庭の父親なんだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Kas Bellardo, the first to guess where this is going, falls to his knees.{/n} "Mercy! I haven't done anything wrong! I'm not a pirate, not a cutthroat, just a harmless drunk! And a single father to boot!"

traits.locale_text: {n}流れに最初に気づき、キャス・ベラルドが膝をついた。{/n}「ゆ、許してくれ！俺は何もしてない！海賊でもないし、冷酷非道な奴でもない…ただの酔っ払いだ！それに加えて父子家庭の父親なんだ！」

languages.text: {n}Kas Bellardo erkennt als Erster, worauf das hinausläuft, und sinkt auf die Knie.{/n} "Gnade! Ich habe nichts Unrechtes getan! Ich bin kein Pirat, kein Mörder, nur ein harmloser Trunkenbold! Und ein alleinerziehender Vater!"
languages.original_text: {n}Kas Bellardo, the first to guess where this is going, falls to his knees.{/n} "Mercy! I haven't done anything wrong! I'm not a pirate, not a cutthroat, just a harmless drunk! And a single father to boot!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kas Bellardo erkennt als Erster, worauf das hinausläuft, und sinkt auf die Knie.{/n} "Gnade! Ich habe nichts Unrechtes getan! Ich bin kein Pirat, kein Mörder, nur ein harmloser Trunkenbold! Und ein alleinerziehender Vater!"

languages.text: {n}Kas Bellardo, le premier à comprendre la signification de vos paroles, tombe à genoux.{/n} « Pitié ! Je n'ai rien fait de mal ! Je ne suis pas un pirate ni un assassin ! Rien de plus qu'un ivrogne inoffensif ! Et père célibataire ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Kas Bellardo, the first to guess where this is going, falls to his knees.{/n} "Mercy! I haven't done anything wrong! I'm not a pirate, not a cutthroat, just a harmless drunk! And a single father to boot!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kas Bellardo, le premier à comprendre la signification de vos paroles, tombe à genoux.{/n} « Pitié ! Je n'ai rien fait de mal ! Je ne suis pas un pirate ni un assassin ! Rien de plus qu'un ivrogne inoffensif ! Et père célibataire ! »

languages.text: {n}Bu işin varacağı yeri ilk anlayan Kas Bellardo, dizleri üstüne çöküyor.{/n} "Merhamet edin! Ben yanlış bir şey yapmadım! Ne korsanım ne katil, zararsız ayyaşın tekiyim! Üstelik dul bir babayım!"
languages.original_text: {n}Kas Bellardo, the first to guess where this is going, falls to his knees.{/n} "Mercy! I haven't done anything wrong! I'm not a pirate, not a cutthroat, just a harmless drunk! And a single father to boot!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Durumun gidişatını anlayan ilk konuk Kas Bellardo, diz çöküyor.{/n} "Merhamet edin! Ben yanlış bir şey yapmadım! Ben korsan değilim, ben katil değilim, sadece zararsız bir berduşun tekiyim! Hem de dul bir babayım!"
